<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Task Approved">d76f6fa66af74110926907f5e192c613</macroponent><name>Home redirection</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const route = "landing";
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        route,
        params: {
            refresh: Date.now()
        },
        fields: {}
    });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 17:29:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>576f6fa6def7411088fc162d87e54b13</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Home redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PFM" source="x_708650_pfm">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PFM">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_576f6fa6def7411088fc162d87e54b13</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 17:29:30</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
